ygData.subject: Re: Any price recommendations?
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/30/99 2:42:50 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... To bind OTHERS. #1 They must be in your group #2 You must be in a city Zone. After that, you
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/30/99 2:42:50 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
JHoward@... writes:

> Question, does someone have to submit to being Bound or can you BIND them
> without their consent? i don't knwo why you would do this, just curious.

To bind OTHERS.

#1 They must be in your group
#2 You must be in a city Zone.

After that, you can "bind without consent..."

The concept is... if they are in your group they consent. And they further
add safety to it by limiting it to cities. (shurefall glade counts as a
"city" BTW...)
